title: [Question] Does pes discriminate against kcet students
content: I've heard that some teachers are careless initially when we're segregated. Also is the scholarship thing applicable to us as well?

comments.body:
No discrimination except  for extra classes for 1st sem , coz u guys joined late.

And the profs dont care about anything as long as you are in good terms with them.

For availing scholarships, you need to pay some extra amount.
guess we gonna find out from monday
Starts on Monday for round 3 students?
damn, did you get to know from the app? Because for me no one told anything at the campus
Yes, you're put into a bird cage and your ISAs/ESA are pen-and-paper only cause you can't afford to pay more unlike the JEE/PESSAT guys /s
i asked the teacher in F block, she told me abt that, and that classes schedule will come on the app on sunday

I joined through kcet round 3 and i didn't really feel they were careless per say. I mean there are teachers that don't really care but its not cuz we're kcet students... they're just like that to everyone. The scholarship is optional for us. If u want if u gotta pay 10k extra every yr (so basically 40k). For non kcet students its already included in their fees.
